object.name: SuggestedPostRefunded
object.description: Describes a service message about a payment refund for a suggested post.
object.html_description: Describes a service message about a payment refund for a suggested post.
object.rst_description: Describes a service message about a payment refund for a suggested post.

annotations.description: Message containing the suggested post. Note that the Message object in this field will not contain the reply_to_message field even if it itself is a reply.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Message containing the suggested post. Note that the Message object in this field will not contain the reply_to_message field even if it itself is a reply.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Message containing the suggested post. Note that the :class:`aiogram.types.message.Message` object in this field will not contain the *reply_to_message* field even if it itself is a reply.
annotations.name: suggested_post_message

annotations.description: Reason for the refund. Currently, one of 'post_deleted' if the post was deleted within 24 hours of being posted or removed from scheduled messages without being posted, or 'payment_refunded' if the payer refunded their payment.
annotations.html_description: Reason for the refund. Currently, one of “post_deleted” if the post was deleted within 24 hours of being posted or removed from scheduled messages without being posted, or “payment_refunded” if the payer refunded their payment.
annotations.rst_description: Reason for the refund. Currently, one of 'post_deleted' if the post was deleted within 24 hours of being posted or removed from scheduled messages without being posted, or 'payment_refunded' if the payer refunded their payment.
annotations.name: reason
